11.content:
Name: Shizuha Nemeson (Many call her either Togera, or Shizuhazilla!)
Age: 13 in appearance, but really is at least several hundred years old
Eye color: Purple
Hair style and Color: black hair that is medium but is enough to go down to the back, also uses a pigtail.
Skin: Pale
How Tall: 170ft
Exclusive Power: She can roar like a giant monster, has powerful tail swipes, health regeneration, and can breath a green atomic fire breath and fire balls.
Clothes: Wears a green bra and panties that adjust because she has a tail.
City that she lives in (for this one): Kenzo, Japan (made up small town)
Picture of the monster that I have the influence on here: http://www.gamerstemple.net/vg/games/000...

Bio Story: No one wonder how this creature came to be, but all we know is that she lives in Kenzo, Japan, as city that is mostly reverted back to the ways of the 1800s and early 1900s, where there was no cars or anything. They said that this creature is the goddess and queen of their city, and that everyone honors her and praises her for the things that she does. Legend has it that this creature has been borned out of ancient magic that was use by the Kenzo army during the Imperial War, (alternative history here). They needed something to prevent their city from being taken over, so they created Shizuha, or Togera, and she easily defeated the invading army. Everyone was in marvel of her, and then named her the goddess and queen of Kenzo. She is a fair queen, but can be ruthless at times. She rules Kenzo, Japan with an iron fist, and allows no enemy to come to Kenzo, etc. Still, she is kind and noble, and would help the people, and that's is where she gets her respect. Somehow her clothing changed as time went on, so she now wears what she wears. Somehow her form comes with green scales on her hands, feet, and even a tail that can turn into a spike weapon. She still rules Kenzo to this day, but does go to other cities, and is well respected by them as well.

So what happens now?
11.title: Shizuha

113.content:
At the city of Kenzo, Japan, Shizuha was fighting against the invading army. Many country saw this city as easy target and was about to invade it, but didn't know that the city had the large protector who would willing to defend the country that she loves. Shizuha swung her tail, destroying many planes and stomping the military vehicles. Many soldiers fought against shizuha but with avail. She roared and nabbed many soldiers and ate some.

"No body shall take over the country!" Shizuha said.

She roared as the invaders retreated back, hearing her roar. She was happy as she turned around she saw many civilians cheering for her and she waved at them with smile.

Bio: Anya was created during stalins era in soviet union. In the beginning of 1950, Stalin ordered the scientists to proceed to experiment that will exceed the united states power and Anya was created. She defended the land of Soviet Union from any enemy invasion, and even when the soviet union dissolved in 1991, she continued to serve the motherland. She was the pride of the communist party in modern russia and the parliment created a trust that if anything happens, they have to get permission from the communist party to let her be used in the modern russian army. Anya is very strict and lives in the code of honor, so she defends the weak while killing the oppressor while whispering the old propaganda that was used in the soviet union.

13.content:
Name: Double the Trouble

Civilian names: Miki Hikari and Miko Hikari

Age:14 (both)

Hair style and color: Both are brown however Miki keeps her hair long while Miko is a medium. In Kaiju form, Miki's hair color change to a light blue green while Miko changes to light blue and regular blue in the same hair style, but more braided.

Skin: Peach skin tone

Height: About 300 ft when fused together. While civilian mode, the both of them are 5'0.

Exclusive Powers: They can fused together to gain twice the strength than a regular Kaiju. At times they can switch from depending on who is controlling the body. Which leads to their form changes.

If Miki is in control, she would have a bluish green color in her clothes, hair and eyes also with the ability to absorb energy and reflect attacks. If Miko is in control, it would be the same, but in pure blue with some white with the ability to release energy shock waves, and giant light beams.

They both can shoot out laser blasts and the one not in control appears as a transparent floating head that only Miki or Miko can see and this is used to help come up with plans and mental support. That last part depends on who is in control and at times it would look as f the Kaiju girl is talking to herself. They could both charge up to create an aura that would boost their powers twice as much as they are currently.

They are still learning how to fuse with others.

Clothes: Miki would dress in a magical girl like dress when she is in control while Miko wears a swimsuit like armor.

City: Fusion city, known for their use of a new type of energy source that is Eco-friendly.

Bio: Miki and Miko are twin sisters that are total opposites. Miki is the studious one that loves art while Miko is a jock that likes sports. They used to play with each other as kids, but one day Miko wished that she and her sister can be together again. She got her wish when they both met a man that can use magic and fused them together and make them grow for his pleasure. Now not only they have to live with their new powers, but also deal with the magic man and the people he has cursed.

There story is up to you or me, but the two would not be villains. Also I based this character on a superhero named Firestorm.

131.content:
Miko just got out of practice on a bunch of sports today. Her dedication in sports made people jealous and antagonize her which may be the reason why she gets into fights. She isn't that stupid in school as she does have decent grades, though she does have that willingness to do the impossible.

She stretched out her arms with her sports bag with her ready to go home and eat some dinner. Though she realize that she would have to meet with her twin sister, Miki. Miko always finds her snobby and a show off treating her as if she is a lower life form.

Though this reminded Miko of the times when they were kids and played with each other. Then middle school came and they were separated with their new interest and acquaintances. Miko does wish that she can get along with her sister and be together again.

Sadly, Miko ran into her twin sister after being distracted. They both glared at each other.

"Just because your the smart one, does not mean you get to blame me for your clumsiness.", said Miko.

"Me? Please, I'm not that clumsy. You need to take responsibility.", said Miki.

"Why you?!"

"Hold up.", said a voice.

The twins stopped and looked at a man in a suit with a top hat and a cane. He looked around his late 20's and he seems pretty cool.

"I can see you two's problems and I can grant you your deepest desires.", said the man.

The man pointed at Miki with his cane, "You there, want your sister to mature a bit more."

The man pointed at Miko," And you want to get along with your sister."

"I say, I know what to do for you too.", said the man.

He waved his cane and suddenly Miki and Miko are moving close to each other like two magnets and merge together as one. And then...

Cassie gave her a thumbs up which Lily saw and then prepares her report on this.

And so the pods flew up into the air through the cosmos, finding a planet where the babies can live in. Kari's pod however had a small malfunction that altered the auto pilot and suddenly made her crash into Earth instead of her targeted destination.

Kari's pod was a big as a battleship and it was pulled into the atmosphere. The pod kept the baby safe until it crashed into a barren desert area. The force from the landing created a shock wave that caused major damage to the desert and an earthquake in nearby cities. Now the military spotted this.

"General, we spotted a battleship from space.", said a soldier.

"This better not be a joke.", said the General.

"We are positive that its not, sir."

The soldier gave the General the images that spotted Kari's pod and they set up a mission to investigate. The General and some soldiers came to the pod and looked closed to it.

"Holy Guacamole, I never seen a ship as big as this.", said the General.

The pod then opens and the soldiers pull out their guns. They were then shocked to see a giant baby on it. The General stopped his soldiers and said.

"This is amazing."

"What are we gonna do with it?", said a soldier.

"We'll get the permission to raise her? I think its a her based on how she looked.", said the General.

"I wonder how come your interested in raising something that could be a threat?", said a soldier.

"Its a baby for crying out loud. We just need to examine her and treat her with love. Otherwise she'll turn evil and kill us all."

The soldiers nodded as they agreed with what the General said. This is pretty much how Kari was found and now...

The human's growing intellect would make them ether great allies, valuable slaves, or dangerous enemies to both sides. A truce was called between the warring races. With their battle threating the safety of the humans, and both sides seeing potential uses for the tiny creatures, an agreement was made. Both races would discontinue the fighting and going into a mass hibernation until the humans were advanced enough to enter the war proper and become tools in the battle.

And so, Helena's race and the demon hordes began their long sleep below the seas and under the Earth's ground. They will not awaken until human's are ready for their return...Well, that was the plan.

Someone awoke Helena from her sleep in the ocean. This caused her to turn her attention to the nearest human settlement, New York, NY USA. But is she friend, or foe?

info.brief_description: Giantesses that pays homages to Godzilla, super powered giantesses save/terrorizes cities.
info.description:
Of course my other interactives basically gives you a choice of gentle, evil, neutral... etc, but what if I make them either heroic or make them purely evil, like giant monster evil. In this story... you can make that happen, make your girl terrorize or defend a city at a whopping 140ft-250ft tall with super powers. (All girls can breathe hyperbeam attacks from their mouth or hands, shoot lasers from eyes, has vicious roars... and can breathe and talk underwater)

How you girl gets created is unknown to you, but here are the ground rules.

1.NO GIANTESS UNDER THE AGE OF AT LEAST 13 CAN WEAR A BIKINI

2. The characters can be whatever they want, they can be superheroes defending the city, or giant monsters, maybe big sis, etc... But try to keep the Girlzilla all in Kraft, her powers, size, etc.
3. No male giants.
4. They can be more than one giantess in your own route, but you must however either have them defend the city, or destroy it.
5. I will allow as much vore as you like in this story.
6. All the giantesses will be clothed in some way. No nudity.
7. Sexual content cannot be overdone here, like a few chapters (still clothed)... it's fine, but not like every other chapter.
8. No Lesbian or gay stuff.
9. No tiolet jokes.
10. No piss or poop.
11. Since we are all in this together, you can add onto other's work if you think it fits your style. What I mean here, is that you don't have to add your own made up character to add here, you can add on someone else's work as we are all in this together.
12. I will give ownership of your own path once you came it (notice as I change the (free) to the author who added in that route)
13. While you can have to as many characters in any free spots you haves (Bios must be explained by format as well), you are only permitted up to 3 free spots. We can't have the same author in all spots over and over again.
14. No scat, I just had a negative experience with it, and it just digustes me.

Note: there was a rule that inform that no giantess under the age of 13 can be created, but I just did a 2 week testing on that rule to see how many adds I would receive when there is a ban on underage giantess, of you want that rule back up, pm me, but for now, that former rule is no longer in effect

Now you will be able to create your own character, choose which city she terrorizes, and what exclusive power your girl will have that no other girls can have, but here is a few rules on that.

1. They should be some sort of an origin story on how they grow into giantesses with powers and become kaiju.
2. You can decide if she destroys the city,defends the city, or other. But she must still have monster instincts, like roars, etc
3. The same rules apply from the first 10.
4. They must be in some city, either in the middle of destroying, or if they have already... conquered it, and their form slavery on people can be done.
5. All info like body parts, origin, exclusive powers must be explained.
6. They can be furries, dragonesses, robot giantesses, etc.
7. They can all shoot lasers from their eyes, roar like monsters (you can make your roar in description), breathe underwater, fire hyper beams from either mouth or hands, and they all have an exclusive power.

Bio story on how she became what she is/Where she is from, etc:
